summary: HD textures for the hearthfire DLC
descriptionHtml:
==============================
Description
==============================
Jannis234\'s Upscales is a series of mods that contain better (HD) versions of vanilla textures. They are basically upscaled versions of the vanilla textures that have been modified to look better. Why? Well, my art skills are extremely terrible. These mods are desinged to be a \"placeholder\" so you don\'t have low-res vanilla textures between your high-res mod textures. They obviously don\'t look as good as textures that were made by hand but they still look much better than the low-res vanilla textures.


==============================
Details
==============================
This mod contains textures for the Hearthfire DLC. Hearthfire doesn\'t add a lot of textures but it adds a few (mostly 512x512 and 256x256). This mod contains HD versions (2048x2048) of nearly all textures in Hearthfire.


==============================
Compatibility
==============================
Since this is just a HD replacer, it should be compatible with anything. If you have another texture replacer, you can simply replace my textures with the textures from that mod.


==============================
Installation
==============================
Simply use the Nexus Mod Manager or put the contents of this mod in your Skyrim\'s data folder.


==============================
Credits
==============================
The textures were created in GIMP (+ some GIMP plugins) and are modified versions of Bethesda\'s original textures.
author: Jannis234
